snippet: The Bedford Cheese Shop, founded nine years ago in Williamsburg, Brooklyn, opens a new and bigger space in Manhattan, complete with a classroom that can double as a party room.
abstract: The Bedford Cheese Shop, founded nine years ago in Williamsburg, Brooklyn, opens a new and bigger space in Manhattan, complete with a classroom that can double as a party room.

headline.main: A Cheese Shop, Homey Yet Sleek
headline.print_headline: Food Stuff: A Cheese Shop, Homey Yet Sleek
